remarks: A special version of class substitution commonly used for structures. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Mar-2019.)
statement:
sbcie2s.a $e |- A = ( E ` W ) $.
sbcie2s.b $e |- B = ( F ` W ) $.
sbcie2s.1 $e |- ( ( a = A /\ b = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbcie2s $p |- ( w = W -> ( [. ( E ` w ) / a ]. [. ( F ` w ) / b ]. ps <-> ph ) ) $.
$d E a b $.
$d F b $.
$d W a b $.
$d a b ph $.
$d a b w $.
